definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Siraya, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

sentences.english: And the name of the daughter of Asher was Sarah.
The boundary of the Amorites was from Scorpion Pass to Sela and beyond.
sentences.chinese: 亚摩利人的境界，是从亚克拉滨坡，从西拉而上。

sentences.english: Michelle Syrah form the heart of this basket.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔西拉形式的心脏这篮子里。

sentences.english: The commander of his army was Sisera, who lived in Harosheth Haggoyim.
sentences.chinese: 他的军长西西拉，住在夏罗设歌印。

sentences.english: 'But why?'asked Silas, looking unhappily at them.
sentences.chinese: “为什么？”西拉斯不太高兴地看着他们。

sentences.english: For his 2 nd missionary journey, there was Silas, and later Timothy.
sentences.chinese: 第二次宣教旅行时，有西拉和提摩太同工。

sentences.english: Santa Loreto Syrah Gran Reserva is made from a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon ans Syrah .
sentences.chinese: 花冠特级珍藏赤西拉是由赤霞珠与西拉混合而成。

sentences.english: Santa Loreto Syrah Gran Reserva is made from a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon ans Syrah .
sentences.chinese: 花冠特级珍藏赤西拉是由赤霞珠与西拉混合而成。

sentences.english: This domain also produces a Vermentino, Merlot and Syrah.
sentences.chinese: 该区域还出产韦尔芒提诺，美乐及西拉葡萄酒。

sentences.english: You may sleep on the deck or in the hold, as you prefer. Ysilla will find bedding for you.
sentences.chinese: 你睡在甲板还是货仓随你便，伊西拉会给你找点铺盖。

sentences.english: Asher had a daughter named Serah.
And he said unto her, Give me, I pray thee, a little water to drink;
sentences.chinese: 西西拉对雅亿说，我渴了，求你给我一点水喝。

sentences.english: This Shiraz is loaded with dark juicy black currant aromas.
sentences.chinese: 这西拉充满了多汁的黑加仑香气。

sentences.english: I didn’tget to see it really happening but I saw him dead.
sentences.chinese: 我并无亲眼见到，但我知道西西拉的确死了。

sentences.english: Zeller with some guards are waiting for them.
sentences.chinese: 西拉带着卫兵在门口等候。

sentences.english: It was a good fit for Paul's purpose in this 2 nd missionary journey.
sentences.chinese: 对保罗来说，西拉是第二次宣教旅行的合适人选。
